Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.FileUtil

extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains some methods to manipulate files.

      • testCaseContent

        public static java.lang.String testCaseContent(java.lang.String testFile,
                               int wishedLine)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Returns some lines for more detailed info about the test cases whom discovered specified error.
        Parameters:
        testFile - The test file where the error was called.
        wishedLine - The line of the file where the error was founded.
        Returns:
        String containing 6 lines from the file for info.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When failing to read the file.
